TopicTitle: The BEST Saturn V videos you can find.

Articles.Content: Im typing up a little presentation for the 20th and I need videos.. GOOD videos. Youtube is loaded with Satun V launch footage, but most of it is compilations with often times music or other audio dubbed over it. Im looking for RAW, high quality launch footage. Now.. there was one posted awhile back. It was a clever edit of several Saturn V launches made to look like one. It was beautiful. Raw, powerful sound and great quality. Does anyone know the wearaboust of this vid? Or any other great vids? Even gifs would be cool.

You might want to check out archive.org. They should have high quality video of such things.

There are obscure accounts on YouTube with such footage. It's not easy to find it, as Google obviously thinks they know better than the user searching for something.
I cant make heads or tails of that site.. I type in 'Saturn V Launch" and .. a few things come up. Along with everything else. Oh and the video needs to be able to be imbedded.

Two of my favourite ones

Edit: and the top one seems to be the one you want Edited July 17, 2014 by TheCanadianVendingMachine
That's the one! Thanks so much. And that second intrigues me ill have to give that a watch.
